short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reach a much bigger audience on ProductHunt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HunterPod connects you to a community of creators and boosts your ProductHunt launches through mutual support.

- How it works ?
Every time a HunterPod member launches a product on ProductHunt, a new tab automatically opens (on all members) and upvote it, so you don't have to do anything!

- How do I add my ProductHunt launch?
Sign up to HunterPod (on hunterpod.com), go to your dashboard and add your product launch infos. That's all!
